author: Akai
name: GameStreams
install_msg: Thank you for installing the GameStreams cog. This cog requires `Streams` cog. To receive live updates about new game streams, provide a Client ID and Client Secret from [Twitch](https://dev.twitch.tv/dashboard/apps). Read `[p]streamset twitchtoken` for more info.
description: Get real-time announcements whenever a new stream starts for a specific game.
short: Receive live announcements for new game streams.
end_user_data_statement: This cog only processes data related to game stream announcements and does not store any personal user information.
